name: Escape (itch) (Estenyn)
description:
Gael is young. Very young. They're uncertain. They don't know what it means to be an adult yet. They have one good thing: an island to escape to - at least for now.

Things will change very soon for Gael.

Not that they're aware.

Made in RPGMaker MV, using only the materials offered by the program - my first ever game. Cover image is of the main character, Gael - the main games will have their own special cover images.
